value:
$WmMPID_ルキナ,ch04_01_Lucina_F_Normal,Face|$w0|Robin has informed me that you
Order of Heroes people are
tricky to take on.$k$pYour tactician is clever too, which
is high praise from Robin.
Ah, $Nu, is it?$k$pYou don't stand a chance against
me—with or without my father to help.
I'll show you how we do things!$k$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_02,0|$WmMPID_ルキナ,ch04_01_Lucina_F_Normal,Face|$w0|Wait, you've been fighting to
free us? It's all so clear now. How
could we have been so wrong?$k$pWhat's that now? You're in search
of a missing friend—a lancer by
the name of Zacharias?$k$pI'm sorry to say that I've never
heard of such a person.$k$pI know, more than most, how
painful it is to lose someone
precious to you.$k$pI hope that you and Zacharias
are reunited soon.$k$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Cool|$w0|After all that—still, nothing?$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|$w0|Where ARE you, Zacharias?
Where?!$k$pHe taught me all I know about
lances, and I've hoped he could
see how much I've improved!$k$pBut no matter how many battles
I fight...and how long we look
for him...$k$pI'm never going to see him
again, am I?$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|$w0|Stop your wailing, Sharena!
We're on a mission, and I won't
have you acting like a child!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Anger|$w0|Sorry, Commander.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|$w0|You too, Alfonse! Wipe that sorry
look off your face. What would
Zacharias say if he saw this?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|$w0|My apologies, Commander.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|$w0|Besides, if anyone here should be
heartbroken...it's me. I'm the
commanding officer.$k$pZacharias was my responsibility.$k$pIf he is dead, I will be the one to
bear the grief. I need you all to
stay focused on our fight.$k$p$EFace_Cool|We won't put Zacharias behind
us, but we must keep our eye on
the threat right in our path!$k$pPrincess Veronica! She is surely
scheming as we speak. Now,
let's return home.$k$Sbs150|
